summary: Multi-grade (Turmas Multisseriadas) feature testing completed successfully. All 7 features verified through backend API tests and frontend UI tests.
seed_data_creation: Created test school 'Escola Teste Multisseriada' with Fundamental Anos Iniciais (1º-5º Ano), multi-grade class 'Turma Multi 1-2-3', and test student 'Aluno Teste Multisseriada'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-grade feature fully implemented and tested. Test data exists in database for further testing.

1_backend_class_model.description: Class model accepts is_multi_grade (bool) and series (List[str])
1_backend_class_model.evidence: pytest test_create_multi_grade_class passed - created class with is_multi_grade=True and series=['1º Ano', '2º Ano', '3º Ano']

2_backend_enrollment_model.evidence: pytest test_create_enrollment_with_student_series passed - created enrollment with student_series='2º Ano'

3_frontend_multi_grade_checkbox.description: Checkbox 'Turma Multisseriada' appears when education level has more than 1 grade available
3_frontend_multi_grade_checkbox.evidence: Screenshot 16_nivel_selected.png shows checkbox appearing after selecting 'Ensino Fundamental - Anos Iniciais'

4_frontend_multi_series_selection.description: When multi-grade enabled, allows selecting multiple series with checkboxes
4_frontend_multi_series_selection.evidence: Screenshot 17_multi_grade_enabled.png shows series checkboxes (1º-5º Ano) with validation message '⚠️ Selecione pelo menos 2 séries'

5_frontend_table_badge.description: Table shows 'Multi' badge for multi-grade classes
5_frontend_table_badge.evidence: Screenshot 19_class_table_with_badge.png shows 'Multi' badge with '3 séries' text in SÉRIE/ETAPA column

6_frontend_enrollment_series_dropdown.description: Enrollment modal shows series dropdown when class is multi-grade
6_frontend_enrollment_series_dropdown.evidence: Screenshot 30_series_dropdown_visible.png shows 'Série do Aluno * (turma multisseriada)' dropdown with help text 'Esta turma atende às séries: 1º Ano, 2º Ano, 3º Ano'

7_frontend_button_validation.description: Confirmar Matrícula button disabled when multi-grade class selected but series not chosen
7_frontend_button_validation.evidence: Playwright test confirmed: button disabled=True when no series, disabled=False after series selected

screenshots_taken: 16_nivel_selected.png - Education level selected, multi-grade checkbox visible
31_button_enabled.png - Confirmar Matrícula button enabled after series selected
